description: Overall, very neat. Not the most user freindly, however it looks like a very promising program. Hope to see more development in the future!

The app contain an bug (https://github.com/ktechlab/ktechlab/issues/60#issuecomment-745584243).
The issue was fixed on the latest github release.

Please update the binary....

thanks
summary: very good but this binary have bugs

description: I would love to see the components militarized and documented so others can develop components for the program. I would also love to see the ATMEL AtMega family of MCUs added, along with some peripheral chips like the PCF8574 and similar. All-in-all a great little ide for teaching PIC microcontrollers. I'd would use it for teach microcontrollers in general if other MCUs are added.
Funciona bien pero al momento de medir los voltajes de un circuito de bateria, dos leds y un boton, las lecturas con el medidor de voltaje son irregulares
